line.text: Cupid laid by his brand and fell asleep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A maid of Dian this advantage found
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And his love-kindling fire did quickly steep
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In a cold valley-fountain of that ground
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which borrowed from this holy fire of Love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A dateless lively heat still to endure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And grew a seeting bath which yet men prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against strange maladies a sovereign cure
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But at my mistress eye Love brand new-fired
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The boy for trial needs would touch my breast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I sick withal the help of bath desired
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thither hied a sad distempered guest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But found no cure the bath for my help lies
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Where Cupid got new fire my mistress eyes
